verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if thou art become <S%H6148>surety<s%> for thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>, If thou hast <S%H8628>stricken<s%> thy <S%H3709>hands<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>;
Thou art <S%H3369>snared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, Thou art <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H645>now<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H935>thyself<s%>, Seeing thou art come into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7511>humble<s%> <S%H7292>thyself<s%>, and importune thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>;
Give <S%H5414><s%> not <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, Nor <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to thine <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>;
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> thyself as a <S%H6643>roe<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6833>hunter<s%>, And as a bird from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler<s%>.
Go <S%H3212><s%> to the <S%H5244>ant<s%>, thou <S%H6102>sluggard<s%>; <S%H7200>Consider<s%> her <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>:
Which having no <S%H7101>chief<s%>, <S%H7860>Overseer<s%>, or <S%H4910>ruler<s%>,
Provideth <S%H3559><s%> her <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer<s%>, And <S%H103>gathereth<s%> her <S%H3978>food<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.
How long wilt thou <S%H7901>sleep<s%>, O <S%H6102>sluggard<s%>? When wilt thou <S%H6965>arise<s%> out of thy <S%H8142>sleep<s%>?
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber<s%>, A <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep<s%>:
So shall thy <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as a <S%H1980>robber<s%>, And thy <S%H4270>want<s%> as an <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H120>person<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>, Is he that <S%H1980>walketh<s%> with a <S%H6143>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>;
That <S%H7169>winketh<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that <S%H4448>speaketh<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, That <S%H3384>maketh<s%> signs with his <S%H676>fingers<s%>;
In whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8419>perverseness<s%>, Who <S%H2790>deviseth<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>continually<s%>, Who <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4066>discord<s%>.
Therefore shall his <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>; On a <S%H6621>sudden<s%> shall he be <S%H7665>broken<s%>, and that without <S%H4832>remedy<s%>.
There are <S%H8337>six<s%> things which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%>; <S%H7651>Yea<s%>, seven which are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H5315>him<s%>:
Haughty <S%H7311><s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, And <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>;
A <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H2790>deviseth<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>purposes<s%>, <S%H7272>Feet<s%> that are <S%H4116>swift<s%> in <S%H7323>running<s%> to <S%H7451>mischief<s%>,
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> that <S%H6315>uttereth<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>, And he that <S%H7971>soweth<s%> <S%H4090>discord<s%> among <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, And <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>:
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> upon thy <S%H3820>heart<s%>; <S%H6029>Tie<s%> them about thy <S%H1621>neck<s%>.

When thou <S%H1980>walkest<s%>, it shall <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H7901>thee<s%>; When thou sleepest, it shall <S%H8104>watch<s%> over <S%H6974>thee<s%>; And when thou awakest, it shall talk with <S%H7878>thee<s%>.

For the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp<s%>; And the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H216>light<s%>; And <S%H8433>reproofs<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>:
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, From the <S%H2513>flattery<s%> of the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%>'s <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
Lust <S%H2530><s%> not after her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in thy <S%H3824>heart<s%>; Neither let her <S%H3947>take<s%> thee with her <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>.

For on account <S%H1157>of<s%> <S%H802>a<s%> <S%H2181>harlot<s%> a man is brought to a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>; And the <S%H802>adulteress<s%> <S%H6679>hunteth<s%> for the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%>.
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, And his <S%H899>clothes<s%> not be <S%H8313>burned<s%>?
Or can <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> upon hot <S%H1513>coals<s%>, And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> not be <S%H3554>scorched<s%>?
So he that goeth <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>; Whosoever <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> her shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>.
Men do not <S%H936>despise<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%>, if he <S%H1589>steal<s%> To <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> when he is <S%H7456>hungry<s%>:
But if he be <S%H4672>found<s%>, he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%>; He shall <S%H5414>give<s%> all the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

He that committeth <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> is <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>: He <S%H6213>doeth<s%> it who would <S%H7843>destroy<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Wounds <S%H5061><s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> shall he <S%H4672>get<s%>; And his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> shall not be wiped <S%H4229>away<s%>.
For <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is the <S%H2534>rage<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%>; And he will not <S%H2550>spare<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>.
He will not <S%H5375>regard<s%> any <S%H3724>ransom<s%>; Neither will he rest <S%H14>content<s%>, though thou givest <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts<s%>.
